name: AnonyDoxx
description: AnonyDoxx privately and securely verifies the identities of investors, developers, and other experts. Using our Vault Verification protocol, successfully validated individuals are invited to our verified blockchain network of pre-vetted, approved, and ADXX certified industry professionals. Investors, employers, and project owners can access our network to review verified projects, hire experts through our talent community, and automate their recruiting and onboarding process using our ever-growing utility suite.
